page.title: 19SHOPS IN BURWELL.
page.content: {Mike's Shop. The new{owner}of{The Mace Shop}has lived in Burwell for 15 years.He{was once a{youth tutor}at the Village College and{Warden at Burwell House. To stay in the village, 8 months ago he decided to buy the shop with living accommodation at the back.It was{built {in 1955.}He gets on{average 1080 {customers a week.}His{busiest day}is {Tuesday.}He{employs 6}people and{takes {Â£50 per day. All the{bakery produce}is from{Lane's. Most of the{rest}comes{from Cambridge {or Bishops Stortford.}He sells fruit and veg',sweets,crisps,canned drinks and ice-cream as well as general groceries. {Redhead's Fruit and Vegetable Shop Some example prices are new potatoes 40p per 5lbs,tomatoes 45p per lb,broad beans 15p per lb,oranges 8p each.
